:{"keccak256":"0x000865ddb3983f9e27b77c6300547c990f1e8bac457814552295b2a5e34d4d93","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a79f34777739cf15d5e02b8c11eb03037964bc050afe145dd970909fd5bc84aa","dweb:/ipfs/QmcynWefDhvYyyc7oxpYR655gQA2WkfbXX6dWCDioRDtDS"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa94b34880e3c1b0b931662cb1c09e5dfa6662f31cba80e07c5ee71cd135c9673","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://40fb1b5102468f783961d0af743f91b9980cf66b50d1d12009f6bb1869cea4d2","dweb:/ipfs/QmYqEbJML4jB1GHbzD4cUZDtJg5wVwNm3vDJq1GbyDus8y"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9750c6b834f7b43000631af5cc30001c5f547b3ceb3635488f140f60e897ea6b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a7d5b1ef5d8d5889ad2ed89d8619c09383b80b72ab226e0fe7bde1636481e34","dweb:/ipfs/QmebXWgtEfumQGBdVeM6c71McLixYXQP5Bk6kKXuoY4Bmr"]},"node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe2e337e6dde9ef6b680e07338c493ebea1b5fd09b43424112868e9cc1706bca7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6df0ddf21ce9f58271bdfaa85cde98b200ef242a05a3f85c2bc10a8294800a92","dweb:/ipfs/QmRK2Y5Yc6BK7tGKkgsgn3aJEQGi5aakeSPZvS65PV8Xp3"]}},"version":1}

addFaciliator(uint128,string).details: Only the admin can call this function; it acts in the FACILITATOR_MANAGER_ROLE for the GHO token contract

params.label: The label to set for the facilitator
params.mintLimit: BucketCapacity to set for the Facilitator

burn(uint256).details: User calls this after approving the tokens

params.amount: The amount of tokens to burn

onAxelarGmp(address,uint256).details: Only the bridge can call this function

params.amount: The amount of tokens to mint
params.recipient: The address to mint tokens to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateMintLimit(uint128).details: Only the admin can call this function; it acts in the BUCKET_MANAGER_ROLE for the GHO token contract

addFaciliator(uint128,string).notice: Adds a new facilitator (itself as one) to the GHO token contract

burn(uint256).notice: Transfer GHO tokens from the User to the Facilitator contract and burn them in the GHO contract

onAxelarGmp(address,uint256).notice: Mints new GHO tokens by calling the token contract, called upon bridge message

updateMintLimit(uint128).notice: Update the BucketCapacity for the facilitator
